title: Rwanda’s CPI up 3.7 pct year on year in September 2015 (National Bank of Rwanda) ...
text: ( Source : National Bank of Rwanda ) 12.10. 2015 08:30 Age: 5 hrs Category : BNR News In September 2015 , Rwanda 's Consumer Price Index ( CPI ) which is the main gauge of inflation registered a year on year increase of 3.7 percent, higher than 3
